introduction: SYNOPSISNa-young, a call girl, meets Dong-min through her friend Kyung-ah. Dong-min, who comes from a wealthy family, falls for her and she for him. But his father, Chairman Kang, who sets their meeting up through Kyung-ah to teach Dong-min the facts of life begs Na-young to let his son go. Na-young is confused but decides to do what is best for him and leaves. Dong-min slowly becomes an invalid as he searches for Na-young. They meet again when Dong-min confronts her and a client walking into her place. Dong-min finally gets his father's permission to marry. But she soon realizes that love is not all that is needed and she leaves to study abroad. Chairman Kang bids a tearful farewell as Dong-min is left with no choice but to become a mature man.故事电话女孩Nayoung与朋友Kyea的介绍会见了富裕家庭的朋友。原因是他的父亲康是要向人民传授爱心和勇气，但是Nayyung和Dongmin每天都在爱上不同的爱。总督被要求归还他的儿子，乞求回归，Nayoung徘徊。当她在寻找她时，东敏成了一个失败者。为了拯救人民，京畿道寻找Nayoung。最后，Nayoung进入房子和房子没有名字，但东敏与他在一起。而东民终于得到了父亲的同意。然而，Nayoung正在出国留学，因为现实不允许他生活在爱情之上。康熙总统用眼睛凝视着眼睛，东民被迫成为一个成熟的男人。
